email_text:
Subject: Urgent Action Required: Your Apple ID has been locked

Dear Apple user,

We regret to inform you that your Apple ID has been locked due to suspicious activity detected on your account. In order to secure your account and prevent any unauthorized access, we kindly ask you to reset your Apple ID immediately.

To reset your Apple ID, please click on the link provided below and follow the instructions carefully:

[Phishing link]

Please note that failure to reset your Apple ID within the next 24 hours may result in permanent account lockout and loss of access to all your Apple services and devices.

If you believe this lockout is a mistake or have any concerns regarding your account security, please contact Apple Support immediately for further assistance.

Thank you for your cooperation in keeping your Apple account safe and secure.

Sincerely,
Apple Support Team
